name: muscu-pwa
description: Application PWA pour la gestion d'entraÃ®nements de musculation

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run prisma:migrate && cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
